name: Mild Hypertension
chief_complaint: I've been feeling a bit dizzy lately, and my doctor said my blood pressure was high at my last check-up.

lab_results.blood_test: normal electrolytes, no signs of kidney dysfunction

prognosis: Good with proper management; unlikely to progress if treated early
description: A common condition where the force of blood against artery walls is consistently too high, often asymptomatic until complications arise.
